projects.title: Software developer (React)
details: Participated in the development of an innovative rental web application as a Fullstack Developer.
Played a key role in a multidisciplinary team, promoting agile methodologies and cutting-edge tools such as React, Tailwind CSS, Material-Tailwind, TypeScript, Docker.
Actively involved in the planning, design, and implementation of critical components, solving complex technical challenges with creative and effective solutions.

projects.title: Software developer (Angular)
details: Developed responsive web and mobile applications, ensuring optimized user experiences across various devices.
Contributed to innovative commercial projects using Angular, PHP, HTML5, CSS3, and Ionic Framework.
Improved application efficiency and usability through continuous maintenance and constant enhancements.
Resolved complex technical issues, reducing response times and ensuring system functionality.

projects.title: Full-stack Web Developer Freelance (Angular)
details: Designed and developed a client management application using Angular and Java, optimizing administrative processes for multiple offices.
Implemented advanced PDF printing functionality, enhancing the automatic generation of documents and reports.
Designed and integrated a cash management system, improving daily financial control.
Managed the installation, configuration, and proper use of the application in various offices, ensuring a smooth transition and ongoing technical support.

profile.subheader: Systems Analyst and Full-Stack Web Developer trained at IAES and Argentina Programa. Experienced in innovative technology projects, working in agile teams, and contributing to the development of web applications with technologies like Angular, React, TypeScript, and Docker.

iaes.description: Pursuing a degree in Systems Analysis.

pearson.description: English course provided by Argentina Programa in partnership with Pearson.

argentina_programa.description: Program sponsored by the Ministry of Economy, focused on web development with the goal of becoming a Fullstack Developer.
